# Junior Non-Commissioned Member Training Accommodation Facility Request for Proposals

## English Title
Design Build Services for Junior Non-Commissioned Member Training Accommodation Facility, CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia. 
Solicitation Number: C000264

## Description
In accordance with relevant rules, regulations, and professional associations, Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites Proposals from Design-Build Teams to provide professional services for the design and construction of the Junior Non-Commissioned Member Training Accommodation Facility at CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia. 

## Tender Information
* **Solicitation Number:** C000264
* **Publication Date:** February 14, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 9, 2024, at 14:00:00
* **Estimated Construction Cost:** In the order of magnitude of $181 Million

## Requirements

* The winning Proponent will provide a comprehensive scope of work, including design and construction services for the facility.
* Proposals will be evaluated based on the evaluation criteria outlined in the RFP document.
* The estimated construction cost for the project is $181 Million.

## Instructions

* Proposals must be submitted through the MERX Electronic Bidding System by the closing date and time indicated.
* Questions regarding this solicitation must be directed to the point of contact identified in this advertisement.
* Late or incomplete Proposals will not be accepted.

## Security Requirements
The Security Requirements for this Project are identified in the RFP Documents.

## Trade Agreements
The Procurement is subject to the following Trade Agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

## Contract Award Information
DCC publicly discloses information on payments made to prime contractors. Information on payments made in the past 90 days on construction contracts over $100,000 can be obtained from the DCC website.

## Contact Information
Craig Patterson, Defence Construction Canada, Craig.Patterson@dcc-cdc.gc.ca, 613-794-5311

## Tender Status
This solicitation has expired.
